channel.title: Microphones on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Microphones on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Addicted To Spectrum
item.description: [big]You know a tool that’s proved incredibly useful to the theater world? The wireless microphone. It sounds small, but it’s actually a really huge improvement over what they previously had.[/big] These devices, which have come into their own over the past two decades, have helped to improve actors’ freedom of movement allowing their performances to be more natural while still remaining fairly easy to hear. But they haven’t always been perfect.
